component.name: albumRowList
component.script:
function init() m.albumRowList = m.top.findNode("albumRowList") m.fullAlbum = m.top.findNode("fullAlbum") m.fullAlbumTwo = m.top.findNode("fullAlbumTwo") m.top.itemComponentName = "RowListItem" m.top.numRows = 2 m.top.itemSize = [296 * 3 + 20 * 2, 355] m.top.rowHeights = [400] m.top.rowItemSize = [ [396,313], [396,313], [396,313] ] m.top.itemSpacing = [ 40, 0 ] m.top.rowItemSpacing = [ [20, 0] ] m.top.rowLabelOffset = [ [0, 30] ] m.top.rowFocusAnimationStyle = "floatingFocus"
m.albumsReader = createObject("roSGNode", "AttrReader") m.albumsReader.observeField("content","GetRowListContent") m.albumsReader.contenturi = "http://www.drewperez.com/albumsCovers.xml" m.albumsReader.control = "RUN" end function
function GetRowListContent() as object m.content = m.albumsReader.content m.rowOneListContent = m.content.getChild(0) myNode = CreateObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode") lilNodeOne = myNode.CreateChild("ContentNode") for i = 0 to m.rowOneListContent.getChildCount() - 1 data = m.rowOneListContent.getChild(i) print "data is " data item = lilNodeOne.CreateChild("RowListItemData") item.posterUrl = data.HDGRIDPOSTERURL item.labelText = data.title end for m.top.content = myNode end function
